unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Identifying endpoints allows attackers to target critical ML APIs with disruption or resource exhaustion attacks.
Endpoint configuration details may highlight attached monitoring or logging integrations that adversaries later disable.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListEndpoints to find live ML services that can be hijacked for inference abuse, data theft, or service disruption.
